description:
## General Issue

Use this form to report bugs, ask questions about EMD, request new features, or flag documentation issues. For data submissions (grid cells, components, models), please use the appropriate Stage 1-4 templates instead.

> [!NOTE]
> Please provide as much detail as possible to help us understand and address your issue quickly.

label: Affected Areas
description: The parts of EMD that this issue relates to.

label: Description
description: A detailed description of the issue including what happened and what you expected.
placeholder:
1. What happened or what you need
2. What you expected
3. Any error messages

label: Steps to Reproduce
description: For bugs: the steps needed to reproduce the issue.
placeholder:
1. Go to...
2. Click on...
3. See error...

description:
---

## Issue Handling

Your issue will be triaged by the EMD team. We aim to respond within 5 working days.
